participant_1.name: Maggie
participant_1.personality: Maggie is warm-hearted and nurturing, with a creative spirit that shines through her baking and knitting. She tends to be reflective and a bit anxious about life's uncertainties.
participant_1.background: knitting is my passion. i love to bake cookies. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i have a dogs. i am scared of dying.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Ethan is adventurous and enthusiastic, with a strong sense of responsibility. He is curious and analytical, always eager to learn more about the world around him.
participant_2.background: i walk dogs for a living. i'm also a graduate student. i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills.
